name: Denise GOLSON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent

parties: Denise GOLSON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of December, 2002, this matter was improvidently filed as a petition for allowance of appeal under Pa.R.A.P. 1112, where the proper mode of review is an appeal under Pa.R.A.P. 1101. Upon review of the merits of the claim, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
812 A.2d 552
Denise GOLSON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 18, 2002.
